TopicDetails.title: Targeted, specialised training

3253943.action: HERCULE-TC-2017-02 - HERCULE-AG Hercule III Action Grant

HERCULE-TC-2017-03 - HERCULE-AG Hercule III Action Grant

TopicDetails.description:
Scope:

The organisation of training for staff employed by eligible bodies listed in Article 6 of Regulation 250/2014 ("Targeted, specialised training") in the areas relevant for the protection of the financial interests of the Union ("PIF"-investigations), such as:

  1. digital forensics training: securing evidence in a lawful manner collected from digital information devices;
  2. gathering of evidence admissible in court proceedings;
  3. best practices and techniques for interviewing witnesses or persons concerned in PIF-investigations, in particular individuals from other Member States or countries;
  4. awareness raising and knowledge transfer in relation to different reporting practices and requirements in other Member States;
  5. awareness raising and knowledge transfer in relation to the requirements and practices from mutual legal assistance agreements.
